summary: This mod changes the level lists for vendors so arrows are always stocked.  Blacksmiths will generally stock 30-50 arrows of a type and fletchers generally have 200-300 arrows of a type.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	        LFox Vendors Have Arrows v1.01
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the vendor leveled
lists for arrows.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

High quality arrows are hard to come by from vendors especially
since they don\'t always stock them.  This mod changes the level
lists for vendors so arrows are always stocked.  Blacksmiths
will generally stock 30-50 arrows of a type and fletchers
generally have 200-300 arrows of a type.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.01
- Made Daedric Arrows buyable cause i\'m sick of not having them.

v1.0
- Made the plugin
author: LFox
